ul.li: For "background-spacing", initial is "0", it applies to all elements, it is not inherited, and percentage values are N/A.

body.h3: If statement above is correct, this h3 heading should have a background spacing of 20px in the x direction for its flag image. The rule applied is "h3 {background-spacing: 20px; background-image: url(flagbg.gif)} ". body.h4: This h4 heading should have background spacing of 80px in y direction for its oval button image. Rules applied are "h4 {background-spacing: 80px; background-repeat: repeat-y; background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif);}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph, like the one above. However, it may not be long enough to support a background image.
